CustomField.description: Business Hours Id or 'Case' to signify which Business Hours to base calculation on. The calculations include time lapsed since case creation and time lapsed since last activity. If 'Case' is specified, Case business hours or Entitlement business hours will be used (in that order)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Business Hours Id or 'Case' to signify which Business Hours to base calculation on. The calculations include time lapsed since case creation and time lapsed since last activity.
CustomField.label: Business Hours
